cause.description:
I just want to help get the word out that all this drinking and driving is getting bad, and all the families that are loosing loved ones everyday because some parent somewhere didn't tell their kids to call a cab, or call a friend or a family member no matter what time of night it is. I have lost a lot of people this way, and I, myself, have been hit by a drunk driver, so please help put that word out!
1. This is getting out of hand.
2. If you would like to donate, please go to www.madd.org
3. Sign the petition at the link below to help eliminate drunk drivers
4. https://secure2.convio.net/madd/site/SPageServer?pagename=wp6_pledge&JServSessionIdr012=mvemycar05.app7a
